CatDescriptText: The third Crawford Grill was located on the corner of Bidwell Street and Pennsylvania Avenue on Pittsburgh's North Side (Manchester neighborhood) from 1948 to 1955.  It occupied the ground floor of a three story building, had glass brick windows and a corner entrance and neon sign.  The painted sign above the window identifies it as "Crawford's Grill."
TitMainTitle: Crawford Grill No. 3, 1100 Pennsylvania Avenue at Bidwell Street, North Side
